mapper.select:
SELECT EMPLOYEEID, DEPT_NAME, TEAM_NAME, AGENT_NAME, STIMETS, TTALK, IOTYPE, IBANI, OBANI, EXTENSION, TICKET_NUM, CONNID FROM WDM.V_CALL_LIST WHERE 1=1
AND STIME between WINK1.K2U(#{s_day}) and WINK1.K2U(#{e_day})
AND DEPT_NAME = #{dept_name}
AND TEAM_NAME = #{team_name}
AND IOTYPE = #{iotype}
AND (IBANI in (${ani}) OR OBANI in (${ani}))
AND IBANI in (${ani})
AND OBANI in (${ani})
AND AGENT_NAME in (${agentid})
AND CONNID in (${connid})
AND TICKET_NUM in (${ticket_num})
ORDER BY STIMETS ASC
